data.eml:eml: A contribution to the knowledge of Orthoptera diversity from Peninsular Malaysia: Bukit Larut, Perak

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Ming Kai, Kamaruddin, Khairul Nizam (2016): A contribution to the knowledge of Orthoptera diversity from Peninsular Malaysia: Bukit Larut, Perak. Zootaxa 4111 (1): 21-40, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4111.1.2
